attributes.action: stop the imposition of the average speed cameras on our highways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Average speed cameras will perversly cause more accidents on our motorways due to drivers concentrating on their speedo rather than the road ahead.

my petition is therefore based on the premise that these dreadful spys in the sky are a danger to road users.
 Infact their is a case to increase the speed limit to 85 mph due to the technological advances in cars

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the imposition of the average speed cameras on our highways."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19062


Prime Minister's Office
